html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-04802024-05-03FIN
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Crown Corporation General Regulations, 1995
PrecisRegulations Amending the CROWN CORPORATION GENERAL REGULATIONS, 1995 in order to (1) to exempt the Canada Development Investment Corporation and its subsidiaries (present or future), including TMP Finance and Trans Mountain Corporation, from seeking Governor in Council approval for certain types of financial transactions related to the operation or divestiture of the pipeline (e.g., creating subsidiaries, acquiring or disposing of shares in a corporation).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0078 Publication Date: 2024-05-22
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the CROWN CORPORATION GENERAL REGULATIONS, 1995 in order to (1) to exempt the Canada Development Investment Corporation and its subsidiaries (present or future), including TMP Finance and Trans Mountain Corporation, from seeking Governor in Council approval for certain types of financial transactions related to the operation or divestiture of the pipeline (e.g., creating subsidiaries, acquiring or disposing of shares in a corporation).
